trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronization context for the Windows Forms application model.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un contesto di sincronizzazione per il modello di applicazione Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed when a control is created.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> viene installato quando viene creato un controllo.

trans-unit.source: The AutoInstall property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is installed when a control is created, or when a message loop is started.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di installazione automatica determina se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>viene installato quando viene creato un controllo o quando viene avviato un ciclo di messaggi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> is installed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> è installato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Copia il contesto di sincronizzazione.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Una copia del contesto di sincronizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>occupata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: Dispatches an asynchronous message to a synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Invia un messaggio asincrono a un contesto di sincronizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The Post method starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Post avvia una richiesta asincrona per inviare un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>delegato da chiamare.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto passato al delegato.

trans-unit.source: Dispatches a synchronous message to a synchronization context
trans-unit.target: Invia un messaggio sincrono a un contesto di sincronizzazione

trans-unit.source: If the destination thread no longer exists or the value of its <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the Send method raises an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.
trans-unit.target: Se il thread di destinazione non esiste più oppure il valore della relativa <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `false`, il metodo di trasmissione genera un <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is up to the caller to determine what further action to take.
trans-unit.target: Spetta al chiamante di determinare quali ulteriori azioni da intraprendere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback> delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>delegato da chiamare.</xref:System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback>

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto passato al delegato.

trans-unit.source: The destination thread no longer exists.
trans-unit.target: Il thread di destinazione non esiste più.

trans-unit.source: Uninstalls the currently installed <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"></xref> and replaces it with the previously installed context.
trans-unit.target: Disinstalla attualmente installata <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext"> </xref> e lo sostituisce con il contesto precedentemente installato.

trans-unit.source: If the previously installed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is `null`, the current context is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se installato in precedenza <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>è `null`, il contesto corrente è impostato su `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: If the currently installed synchronization context is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Se il contesto di sincronizzazione attualmente installato non è un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, questo metodo non esegue alcuna operazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>
